result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Case Called: 10:02 am
INCLUDES 21CF515 & 22CF132.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Davis Runde in person:
Defendant appears in person and with Atty Chad Shamali in person;
VRCW. 
State notes that the Defendant has picked up a new file, and the parties are to call this case today as well.

INITIAL APPEARANCE ON 22CF132:
Complaint Filed. Reading Waived. 
Parties are to proceed with Plea Hearing. 

Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. State moves to:
22CF132:
Ct. 1 (BJ-Felony-Repeater)>> DRI.
Ct. 2 (Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)-Repeater)>>DRI.

21CF515:
Ct. 2 (Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)-Repeater)>>DRI.

COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA: 
21CF515:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine-Repeater)>> NO CONTEST.
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
21CF515:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine-Repeater)>> Sentence W/H- 3 Years Probation. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Absolute Sobriety, Court Costs; DNA Sample and Surcharge.

Adjourned: 10:17 am
